1.text: You all raise your drinks in celebration! When a creepy old feller approaches.

2.text: ${player} lifts the boulder with a pink finger and tosses it aside! .The key to the next door apears to be at the bottom of a pit of snakes. How snakey... ha.

5.text: ${player} fails to lift the mighty boulder! Because ${player} is weak!.

6.text: Games over.... this should not be shown.

7.text: ${player} is pushed into the pit he toses out the key but gets bit many times....

8.text: A door creaks open and inside is a horde of skeletons. They charge at you, swords raised.

9.text: With the battle over, you notice a door on the other side of the room.

1.text: Have ${player} try and lift the might boulder!

5.text: Push ${player} into pit to get the key.

7.text: Run through the other door on other side of the room.

8.text: You open the door and move down a dark corridor.
